name: Color Water Sorting Puzzle
description:
Water Color Sort Puzzle is an addictive and challenging puzzle game. You just need to sort the water of the same color into 1 bottle until each color goes into its own bottle. It is also a relaxing and challenging puzzle game to train your brain.

The higher the level is, the more difficult it is that needs you to think critically for each move. For those levels which are extremely difficult, you can use the help to earn more empty bottles.

How to play
- Touch a bottle to pour water to another bottle.
- You can only pour if the two bottles have the same water color on top.
- Each bottle only contains a certain amount of liquid. Once it’s filled, you cannot add more.

FEATURES
- Tap to play.
- Multiple unique levels.
- Easy to play, hard to master.
- You can play offline or without the internet.
- NO penalties & time limits. You can enjoy Water Color Sort Puzzle at your own pace.
